title: Ayurvedic Baby Powder (Mild & Talc-Free)
excerpt: A gentle talc-free baby powder made with rice starch, cornstarch, chamomile and neem to soothe moisture-prone skin.
content:
## What Is This Baby Powder?
A natural, talc-free baby powder designed to keep delicate infant skin dry and comfortable. Made from rice starch, cornstarch, chamomile, and neem for gentle soothing.

## Ayurvedic Significance
Chamomile calms Vata and reduces irritation; neem supports microbial balance; rice starch is light and absorbent.

### Key Benefits
- Absorbs excess moisture.
- Soothes rash-prone or sensitive areas.
- Talc-free and pediatric-friendly.

## Ingredients
- Rice starch
- Cornstarch
- Chamomile
- Neem (tiny amount)

## Usage Instructions
- Dust lightly on clean, dry skin after bath.

## Packaging
- Shaker bottle with pediatric usage notes.

## Safety & Consultation
- Avoid inhalation. Consult pediatrician for newborn use or if rashes persist.

## Why Choose This Powder?
A gentle, safe formula rooted in Ayurvedic comfort and modern pediatric standards.
